company.zh: 腾讯科技 - 企业微信

zh: 负责 AI Agent 审核系统、10 亿级策略分析平台与反作弊治理系统的架构设计与落地
涵盖 RAG/图数据库/分布式系统，独立设计 V1→V4 架构演进
主导策略全生命周期管理平台，支撑 10 亿级数据处理与 200+ 标签分析
设计并实现分布式高可用审核系统，支撑 2000+ 并发，日均 300+ 单自动结单
en: Led architecture design and implementation of AI Agent review system, 10-billion-level strategy analysis platform and anti-fraud governance system
Covering RAG/Graph Database/Distributed Systems, independently designed V1→V4 architecture evolution
Led strategy lifecycle management platform, supporting 10-billion-level data processing and 200+ tag analysis
Designed and implemented distributed HA review system, supporting 2000+ concurrency, 300+ daily auto-completions

achievements: 10 亿级数据分析平台架构师
反作弊治理年化收益 4000 万
PKV 分布式性能 130 倍提升
